template.name: AEalSwitchFloat
template.label: alSwitchFloat
template.description: Use this to select between multiple float values based on the value of a float input.

attribute.name: inputA
attribute.label: InputA
attribute.description: Connect a value here to have it selected by the mix value

attribute.label: InputB
attribute.description: Connect a value here to have it selected by the mix value

attribute.description: Connect a value here to have it selected by the mix value

attribute.label: InputD
attribute.description: Connect a value here to have it selected by the mix value

attribute.description: Connect a value here to have it selected by the mix value

attribute.name: inputF
attribute.label: InputF
attribute.description: Connect a value here to have it selected by the mix value

attribute.label: InputG

attribute.name: inputH
attribute.label: InputH
attribute.description: Connect a value here to have it selected by the mix value

attribute.name: mix
attribute.label: mix
attribute.description: Signal that selects from one of the 8 inputs.

attribute.name: threshold
attribute.label: threshold
attribute.description: Partial threshold at which the signal transitions from one input to the next.
